des:
Unleash the full potential of your 2019 Kuhl and WallMaster smart room air conditioners with voice control. This skill takes full advantage of Alexa smart speakers and fully integrates with the Alexa app allowing voice and graphical control of your smart thermostat.

Start by selecting the "Enable Skill" button on the Alexa app. That links your Friedrich Connect account to Alexa, and enables it to discover your thermostat device(s). Once discovered, you have the ability to control your thermostat via voice commands or the Alexa app thermostat view under your devices tab.

To find the current temperature or mode of your thermostat:
"Alexa, what is the [thermostat name] thermostat current temperature"
"Alexa, what is the [thermostat name] thermostat current mode"

When in COOL / HEAT mode, adjusting the temperature:
"Alexa, make it warmer in here"
"Alexa, make it cooler in here"
"Alexa, set the [thermostat name] to [temperature value]"

Changing the mode of your thermostat:
"Alexa, set [thermostat name] to [available mode]"
 The available modes are HEAT, COOL, and AUTO (for units that support these)

You can also adjust the range of temperatures (for supporting units) when you are in AUTO mode via the Alexa app.
